Title: 99 francs
Writer: Nicolas Charlet (screenplay and dialogue), Bruno Lavaine (screenplay and dialogue), Jan Kounen (screenplay), Frédéric Beigbeder (novel)
Actors: Jean Dujardin, Jocelyn Quivrin, Patrick Mille, Vahina Giocante
Plot: The life of Octave Parango, a flamboyant ad designer, filled with success, satire, misery and love.
Production: CinéCinéma, Pathé, Poste Image, Film 99 Francs, Cofimage 18, Légende Films, Arte France, Canal+
